update sys_user
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
error_count=error_count+1,
lock_time = now(),
where user_id=#{userId} and status<>2
update sys_user set status =1, error_count=0, lock_time = NULL where user_id=#{userId}
update sys_user set password =#{newPwd} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.icon,m.menu_name,m.menu_type,m.parent_id,IFNULL(m.url,'') url,IFNULL(dp.org_path,'') org_path,IFNULL(dp.is_desensite,0) is_desensite from sys_user u INNER JOIN ent_role r on r.role_id=u.role_id INNER JOIN ent_role_menu rm on u.role_id=rm.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu m on m.id=rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN ent_user_data_permission dp on dp.menu_id=m.id and u.user_id=dp.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId} and r.`status`=1 and m.`status`=1 ORDER BY m.sequence ASC
select t.role_id roleId,t.role_name roleName, t.status from ent_role t where t.role_id = (select f.role_id from sys_user f where f.user_id=#{userId})
